channel.title: Abstraction
channel.copyright: The Calvin Abstraction Club is an official student organization of Calvin College serving Calvin students interested in computer science.Mailing List

item.title: Self Promotion
item.description: Are you a Calvin student with a project you would like to promote? Contact us if you think it’ll benefit others to share. We don’t guarantee to list you project, but if we do you’ll find it here.

item.title: 2021 Opportunities Index
item.description: <- Go to 2021s Main Page Go to Resources Page -> An index where you can learn about the opportunities and activities offered by Abstraction and the computer science department at Calvin. Talks We are planning to have around 4-6 talks in the spring. To stay informed about upcoming talks, please subscribe to the Abstraction mailing list (this is not the GNU Mailman abstraction-news list). Jason [ more to come!

item.title: 2021 Resources Index
item.description: <- Go to 2021s Main Page Go to Oppertunities Page -> An index where you can learn about the resources for C.S. at Calvin. Whether hardware or the people who make things work, we hope to make this index all-inclusive. Physical Computers Please subscribe to the Abstraction mailing list (this is not the GNU Mailman abstraction-news list). Links https://missing.csail.mit.edu/ GitHub Student Developer Pack Companies want your eyes! Lots of free stuff.

item.title: About
item.description: Updated Spring of 2021 Last modified: 2021-02-07 13:56:46 -0500 -0500 Our Mission We exist to serve the community of Calvin students interested in computer science. We currently serve by: providing opportunities: specifically talks, jobs/internships for the community to grow, providing resources: people, hardware, software, and providing and growing the C.S. community at Calvin. Joining Abstraction Welcome! Other than subscribing to our emailing list, there are no formal membership procedures to join the Abstraction Club.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact us at abstraction@calvin.edu. . Sometimes you may have better luck with one of our personal emails: Contact David at dar23 at students. calvin . edu Or Aaron at alb83 at students . …. . edu
